name: docuseal
description: DocuSeal is a document signing and form-filling platform that can be self-hosted. It supports templates, workflows, audit trails, and a user-friendly signing experience, making it suitable for contracts, agreements, and HR paperwork automation.
features: Document Templates: Create reusable document templates with predefined fields, signatures, and workflows for consistent processing.
Digital Signatures: Capture legally binding electronic signatures with timestamp verification and certificate validation.
Multi-party Workflows: Route documents through sequential approval chains with automated notifications and status tracking.
Form Builder: Design custom forms with drag-and-drop fields, validation rules, and conditional logic for data collection.
Audit Trails: Maintain comprehensive logs of all document actions, signatures, and modifications for compliance tracking.
API Integration: Connect with external systems through REST APIs for automated document generation and processing workflows.
Real-time Collaboration: Enable simultaneous editing and review with live updates, comments, and version control.
Mobile Optimization: Access and sign documents on any device with responsive design and touch-friendly interfaces.
Bulk Processing: Handle large document volumes with batch operations, automated routing, and progress monitoring.
Custom Branding: Apply organization logos, colors, and styling to maintain brand consistency across all documents.
Advanced Analytics: Track completion rates, processing times, and user engagement with detailed reporting dashboards.
Secure Storage: Encrypt documents at rest and in transit with role-based access controls and retention policies.
